timeline.bodyText: caps is only used for static final variables (i.e. constants?)
timeline.author: cangencer

replies.bodyText: Ok, will revert. Truth to be told I've not come across that many non-final static fields in the past and I've never stopped to consciously make this distinction.
replies.author: jbartok

timeline.bodyText: method should have @Override if it's overriding, or you can just use another method name
timeline.author: cangencer

timeline.message:
Revert "Name static factory properly"

This reverts commit a21bb5f5

timeline.author: viliam-durina

replies.bodyText: Not really, because they are not equal (there are other, extra names in there too). Plus it wouldn't really help. All it would tell us is if a or c is missing, but that wouldn't help. Anyways, I'll investigate further if it happens again.
replies.author: jbartok
